General.Name: TruCap Finance Limited
General.Description: TruCap Finance Limited, a non-banking finance company, engages in the lending business in India. The company operates in two segments, Fund based Activities and Advisory services. It offers micro enterprise loans, SME loans, other structured business, personal loans, gold loans, and related ancillary services. The company was formerly known as Dhanvarsha Finvest Limited and changed its name to TruCap Finance Limited in August 2022. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India. TruCap Finance Limited is a subsidiary Wilson Holdings Private Limited.
